summary.name: Remote Initiation
summary.description: A deck designed for couples who want to explore intimacy from a distance in a gentle yet teasing way. No pressure, just desire growing message after message.

quests.content: Start the chat with a message describing in a sensual way what you're wearing right now.
Send a suggestive (not nude) photo that hints but doesn’t reveal. Your partner may only reply with an emoji.
Send a voice message whispering a phrase you find erotic, no explanations.
Describe an erotic dream you had… but stop before the climax.
Write three words that describe how your partner makes you feel. One must be erotic, the other two sweet.
Describe where and how you’d like to kiss her if you were together right now.
Take a picture of your lips and write what you'd like to do with them to your partner.
Write an erotic sentence using only elegant words. No vulgar language.
Send a video of no more than 5 seconds where you slowly bite your lip or caress your neck.
Write a message that makes your partner blush… without using emojis.
Complete this sentence in chat: 'If I were in your bed now, I’d start with…'
Write a short erotic story starring the two of you. Maximum 5 lines.
Record an audio where you sigh or slowly say her name in a sensual tone.
Play a hot quiz: ask your partner to guess one of your fantasies among three options (two false, one true).
Describe the exact moment you last got turned on thinking about your partner.
Chat without ever using each other's names—only sensual nicknames.
Tell your partner the place where you’d like to make love to her the next time you meet.
End the game by writing an erotic promise you’ll keep the next time you see each other.
Send a photo of your most provocative look and end with: 'The rest you'll discover in person.'
